modShortDescription: Removes Lucky Looter perk and books from the game.
modDescription:
Removes Lucky Looter [perk](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-perks/) and books from the game.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-ShoudensModlets/tree/master/7DTD-LuckyLooterBeGone)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25892-shoudens-misc-modlets-a20/).

**Credits:** [ShoudenKalferas](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/shoudenkalferas/)
